description:
Here is a high-level overview of Model Serving, one of the areas of MLOps. A framework called BentoML explains what needs to be done in a field called Model Serving.

This session will cover two main themes:

Model Serving Framework: BentoML, torchserve, tenrsorflowserving, triton-inference-server
Model Serving Platform: kserve, yatai, sagemaker (deploy part)

We mainly show examples through BentoML and compare different frameworks.

Kim Seong-yeol
Naver Biz CIC is serving on the advertising recommendation side.

related_urls.label: MLOps Model Serving Architecture with BentoML

title: PyCon KR 2023 MLOps Model Serving Architecture with BentoML Sung Ryul Kim
